name: Star Dungeon
description:
In Star Dungeon you play as an astronaut trapped in a Dungeon filled with aliens and traps. You have to move around and place your own traps to kill the aliens, but be careful, because you can also run into your own traps! If you get bored of this you can also play the two player V.S. mode, where each player has to move around and put down traps to trap the other player.

Current version: 1.0.0
